ShadowPierce.Name: ShadowPierce
ShadowPierce.Narrative: launches a dark, piercing shot that silences the enemy.

VenomBlast.Name: VenomBlast
VenomBlast.Narrative: spews a toxic venom that poisons the target.

InfernoSwipe.Name: InfernoSwipe
InfernoSwipe.Narrative: unleashes a fiery claw attack, setting the target ablaze.

IceShard.Name: IceShard
IceShard.Narrative: conjures a sharp shard of ice, chilling the enemy to the bone.

ElectroPulse.Name: ElectroPulse
ElectroPulse.Narrative: sends out a high voltage pulse that stuns the target.

EarthQuake.Name: EarthQuake
EarthQuake.Narrative: causes the ground to shake violently, slowing all enemies.

WindSlicer.Name: WindSlicer
WindSlicer.Narrative: summons a slicing gale that causes deep wounds.

DarkRejuvenation.Name: DarkRejuvenation
DarkRejuvenation.Narrative: casts a forbidden spell that drains life from the enemy to heal.

LightningStrikes.Name: LightningStrikes
LightningStrikes.Narrative: calls down multiple lightning strikes, paralyzing the enemy.
